mdRecord.dcterms:description: Patient Name: Frederick, Charles W. Patient Age: 23. Marital Status: Unknown. Diagnosis: Gun shot wound flesh left shoulder. Location Wounded: Springfield, Va. Date Wounded: 1864/06/26. Nature of Wound: Conical ball. Treatment: Simple dressings. Result: Cured and returned to duty.
